SRE FoundationFabricio Macedo
DevOps Engineer | Site Reliability Engineer | Kubernetes | Python
Greater Dublin
Summary
✉ fabricio.macedo.br@gmail.com 
Experienced in SRE/DevOps with a profound passion for all
computing technologies, boasting over 8 years of expertise.
Enthusiastic about OpenSource and DevOps culture, with a
keen interest in sharing knowledge and assisting team members.
Expertise encompasses Linux, GCP, AWS, Automation (Terraform,
Ansible), Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, GitOps, DevSecOps, and
Observability. As a Site Reliability Engineer, closely collaborated
with architecture and development teams to optimize platform
performance, enhance user experience, and streamline automation
and observability, while focusing on reducing operational toil
wherever possible.
Principal Skills:
-Cloud & Containerisation: Expertise in Kubernetes, OpenShift,
Rancher, Helm, Docker, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), and AWS.
-Automation & Operating Systems: Proficient in Ansible, Terraform,
Python, Shell Script, PowerShell, and Linux distributions such as
Ubuntu, CentOS, Debian.
-Continuous Integration & Deployment (CI/CD): Skilled in Jenkins,
ArgoCD, GitLab CI, and Canary Deployments using Flagger.
-Observability: Advanced knowledge of Prometheus (including
Cortex and AlertManager), Grafana Stack (Loki, Mimir, Tempo),
OpenTelemetry, GCP's StackDriver/Cloud Operations, and Pixie
Cloud (eBPF).
I’m always interested in hearing from former colleagues, managers,
or just interesting professionals, so feel free to contact me if you’d
like to connect.
